We provide Netherlands Windows VPS Hosting on Intel Quadcore Xeon Servers. Our High Performance servers allow the users to work on their Netherlands windows VPS at the speed of a physical server.Our VPSs are used to host online workspaces and for enterprise application hosting.

Our Netherlands Windows VPS are high compatiable for Meta4 Trading, IIS Hosting, Exchange Services, Active Directory, Regular Desktop Documentations, Game Servers, DNS servers, VPN tunnels, and much more. The response times are similar to a Dedicated Server, thus giving users to spend a fraction of the cost of a dedicated server to use a VPS server.
